remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存格失去輸入的焦點、 啟用內容驗證時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation. 取消這個事件會取消目前儲存格的變更。Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell. 當資料繫結模式取消這個事件時，新的值不會推送至基礎資料來源。When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source. 此事件會在虛擬模式中，在取消時不會引發事件。When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the event will not be raised. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件以確保使用者所輸入的只是正整數。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic.
